com.upsight.android.analytics

Class UpsightGooglePlayHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.upsight.android.analytics.UpsightGooglePlayHelper

  • public abstract class UpsightGooglePlayHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class that facilities interactions with Google Play.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BILLING_RESPONSE_RESULT_OK
      In-app purchase response code for success, as defined in Google Play In-app Billing Version 3 API.
      static int BILLING_RESPONSE_RESULT_USER_CANCELED
      In-app purchase response code for user pressed back or canceled a dialog, as defined in Google Play In-app Billing Version 3 API.
      static java.lang.String PURCHASE_INAPP_DATA_SIGNATURE
      The key for the data signature in the response data as defined in Google Play In-app Billing Version 3 API.
      static java.lang.String PURCHASE_INAPP_PURCHASE_DATA
      The key for the purchase data in the response data as defined in Google Play In-app Billing Version 3 API.
      static java.lang.String PURCHASE_RESPONSE_CODE
      The key for the response code in the response data as defined in Google Play In-app Billing Version 3 API.
      static int PURCHASE_STATE_CANCELED
      The 'canceled' in-app purchase state as defined in Google Play In-app Billing Version 3 API.
      static int PURCHASE_STATE_PURCHASED
      The 'purchased' in-app purchase state as defined in Google Play In-app Billing Version 3 API.
      static int PURCHASE_STATE_REFUNDED
      The 'refunded' in-app purchase state as defined in Google Play In-app Billing Version 3 API.

    • Method Detail

      • trackPurchase

        public static void trackPurchase(UpsightContext upsight,
                                 int quantity,
                                 java.lang.String currency,
                                 double price,
                                 double totalPrice,
                                 java.lang.String product,
                                 android.content.Intent responseData,
                                 UpsightPublisherData publisherData)
                          throws UpsightException
        Tracks a Google Play in-app purchase event. This should be called in the Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent) implementation regardless of the resultCode value to ensure that canceled purchases are tracked.
        Parameters:
        upsight - The com.upsight.android.UpsightContext.
        quantity - The number of goods purchased.
        currency - The currency as a 3-character ISO 4217 code.
        price - The price per unit in local currency.
        totalPrice - The total price of the transaction, including fractional amounts of the currency, before store fees have been taken into account.
        product - The product ID of the Google Play in-app product.
        responseData - The purchase response data Intent from Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent). See Google Play In-app Billing Version 3 API.
        publisherData - Optional UpsightPublisherData.
        Throws:
        UpsightException - Thrown when the purchase data is malformed or missing critical data such that the purchase cannot be tracked.

      • trackPurchase

        public abstract void trackPurchase(int quantity,
                                   java.lang.String currency,
                                   double price,
                                   double totalPrice,
                                   java.lang.String product,
                                   android.content.Intent responseData,
                                   UpsightPublisherData publisherData)
                            throws UpsightException
        Tracks a Google Play in-app purchase event. This should be called in the Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent) implementation regardless of the resultCode value to ensure that canceled purchases are tracked.
        Parameters:
        quantity - The number of goods purchased.
        currency - The currency as a 3-character ISO 4217 code.
        price - The price per unit in local currency.
        totalPrice - The total price of the transaction, including fractional amounts of the currency, before store fees have been taken into account.
        product - The product ID of the Google Play in-app product.
        responseData - The purchase response data Intent from Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent). See Google Play In-app Billing Version 3 API.
        publisherData - Optional UpsightPublisherData. * @throws UpsightException Thrown when the purchase data is malformed or missing critical data such that the purchase cannot be tracked.
        Throws:
        UpsightException - Thrown when the purchase data is malformed or missing critical data such that the purchase cannot be tracked.
